name: authentication-policy
description: Defines an authentication policy including the required credential inputs, whether order is enforced, and timeout settings.

fields.name: policy
credential-data-input
fields.description: Reference to the device object that provides credential data input.

fields.name: index
fields.description: The index or sequence number of this credential input in the policy.
A list of credential data inputs required by this policy.

fields.name: order-enforced
fields.description: Indicates whether the order of credential presentation must be enforced.

fields.name: timeout
fields.description: The timeout period in seconds for completing the authentication process.
